short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieve and display SEO-related information from a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays relevant SEO Info, like Meta Robots, Canonicals, hreflang, robotst.txt, sitemap.xml and so on. It is meant as a little free productivity helper for SEO

Version 1.1 contains bugfixes:
- discovers robots.txt even if not directly under root
- accounts for variations and deviations from web conventions in discovered meta info. Normalizes and displays info
